Mode.name: OP CLB
Mode.Description: Open Climb (OP CLB) provides a rapid climb using selected speed and climb thrust. The mode ignores vertical constraints in the flight plan.
Mode.Activation: Activated by pulling the Altitude selector knob when the selected altitude is above the current altitude.
Mode.Behavior: The aircraft pitches to maintain selected speed while autothrust commands climb thrust. The mode continues until the selected altitude is approached, at which point the system transitions to ALT*.
